# Build on the current query using the current line's table. # First thing to do is to see if the current line begins with "query([table]..."
if [[ `echo "$TM_CURRENT_LINE" | egrep "^\s*(query|QUERY|Query)\s*\(\[.*?\]"` ]]; then # Extract the table name from the query TABLE=`echo "$TM_CURRENT_LINE" | awk '{ match($0, "[\[]\[^]\]+[\]]"); print substr($0, RSTART + 1, RLENGTH - 2) }'` echo '${TM_CURRENT_LINE}' echo -n "query([$TABLE]; \${1:conjunction}; [$TABLE]\${2:field})" fi
